Articles.Content:
My challenge i just came up with is that you need to get 100 kerbals to laythe in as little flights and as short amount of time as possible.

RULES:

1. Mods are aloud (no cheaty mods)

2. No refueling unless in laythe or kerbins SOI

3. All kerbals must be within a 5KM radius

4. No kracken drives

5. Have fun!

I suggest using an air breathing thing with rockets for in space.

Winners:

None yet

There are awards for things i think are cool. so yeah.

HAVE FUN!!!
Where is the challenge? You can do this with a single launch.

Where is the challenge? You can do this with a single launch.

Hasnt Whackjob done 500+ kerbals to Laythe (or somewhere else) just for the lulz?

Welp, if I didn't have RSS installed (100+ Kerbals to Titan sounds like a very, very difficult task)...

I guess I could just make a backup and then swap out the games.

I have a plane which could probably get a few hundred Kerbals on a one-way trip, or 1001 if it refueled in LKO. (Of course, I'd need to use mods or cheat engine to de-lag my game).

Although it uses B9's crew tanks, which, while plenty spacious, are not even remotely stock-balanced, holding 12 Kerbals in a bit over 2 tonnes.

Edited December 15, 2014 by Pds314

Mission report, link to more pics:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86427-Laythe-Capitalism%21?p=1378777#post1378777

Hmm...

Hmmmm.....

HMMMMMMMMMM

I will do this with no docking.
